sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.C_ID , A.C_PARENTID , A.C_POSITION , A.C_LEFT , A.C_RIGHT , A.C_LEVEL , A.C_TITLE , A.C_TYPE /* user filed add point*/
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_USER_SCRAP WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_USER_SCRAP WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_USER_SCRAP WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )

sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_USER_SCRAP WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_USER_SCRAP SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_USER_SCRAP SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_USER_SCRAP SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
